Text: with this mp3 player you get much more memory for much less than an ipod .  an ipod with the same amount of memory is $ 150 cheaper .  the reason for this the ipod has " a better user interface " .  i have found that the interface on the nomad is very easy to use if you have a basic knowledge of a computer .  also the ipod has games on it .  games are ok for a cell phone , but mp3 's are for music .
